用户向导插件

插件demo如下：

我是第一个向导
我是第二个向导
我是第三个向导

插件代码如下：

				Html代码
				
				<div ui-tour ui-tour-backdrop="true" ui-tour-append-to-body="true" ui-tour-use-hotkeys="true">
					<div id="mainMenu" tour-step tour-step-title="Main Menu" tour-step-content="Navigate the site using this menu." tour-step-order="0" tour-step-placement="right"
					 tour-step-fixed = "true">
						<span>我是第一个向导</span>
					</div>
					<div id="settings" tour-step tour-step-title="Settings" tour-step-content="Click here to change your settings." tour-step-order="1">
						<span>我是第二个向导</span>
					</div>
					<div id="finalTourMessage" tour-step tour-step-title="Welcome!" tour-step-content="Enjoy using the app!" tour-step-order="2" tour-step-orphan="true" tour-step-backdrop="true">
						<span>我是第三个向导</span>
					</div>
					<button class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="tour.start();">开始向导</button>
				</div>
